title: Clinton, Sanders look to build on debate performances
text:
> Top News Clinton, Sanders look to build on debate performances Hillary Rodham Clinton, right, smiles as Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont, speaks during the CNN Democratic presidential debate Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas. (AP Photo/John Locher) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
